metadata.title: CVE-2017-8365 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The i2les_array function in pcm.c in libsndfile 1.0.28 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read and applicationcrash) via a crafted audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8365` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.25-7ubuntu2.2
sndfile-programs - 1.0.25-7ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25-7ubuntu2.2').
